snippet: The company’s shares surged 9.4 percent, leading strong gains among retailers including J. C. Penney, Nordstrom and Target.
abstract: Stock market climbs back into record territory after Macy's gives optimistic forecast for holiday sales.
lead_paragraph: The company’s shares surged 9.4 percent, leading strong gains among retailers including J. C. Penney, Nordstrom and Target.

headline.main: Retailer’s Holiday Outlook Helps Lift Shares
headline.print_headline: Retailer’s Holiday Outlook Helps Lift Shares
